projects.title: AUDIO VISUALIZER
projects.subtitle: Javascript WebAudio API
projects.content: An Audio Visualizer that uses web audio api and canvas to create a visual representation of the audio. Academic Project. Uses beat detection, frequency analysis, and amplitude analysis to create a unique visual experience.

projects.title: Experiment K9
projects.subtitle: Unity C# Git
projects.content: A puzzle game where the main mechanic is swapping from 3d->2d view. Group Academic/Personal project. I was responsible for the 3d->2d mechanic, the level design, and the implementation of the puzzles.

projects.title: Price of Convenience
projects.subtitle: Javascript React Redux REST API CORS
projects.content: Academic Project. A Website that fetchs API data about the ARPG Path of Exile.

projects.title: Gardenville
projects.subtitle: Javascript Pixi.js
projects.content: Garden simulator game. Academic/Personal Project. Built in one week using Pixi.js.

projects.title: SHOOT-EM-UP
projects.subtitle: Unity C# Collision Detection
projects.content: Classic shoot-'em-up arcade style top down clone.  Academic Project: Recreate the classic game without using Unity's Rigidbody or Collisions

projects.title: DINOSAUR SIMULATION
projects.subtitle: Unity C# Agent Simulation
projects.content: A simple agent simulation project. I expanded the project into a 3d world. Academic/Personal Designing movement behavior for autonomous agents.
